reviewText: actors are attractive and nude most of the time.
DVD in good condition and plays well.
some of the best sex on film- the addition of paint to the mix doesn't hurt, either.

I caught this movie on HBO. The title may lead you to think it a B (maybe a C) movie. It ain't, unless you think boyfriend/girlfriend body painting is anything less than delightful.
You've heard of writer's block. This movie is about a painter afflicted with painter's block. The first three or so minutes are character development; only then do you get the first nude scene.
The actors even look like they're having fun.
....
